entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Peace River
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:46 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -17.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peace River Airport 04:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -17.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 73 %
Wind Chill: -27
Dewpoint: -21.5°C
Wind: NNE 18 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Snow ending near noon then a mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light this afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 24 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 34 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 32. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Periods of snow beginning near midnight. Local amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 32. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Amount 2 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 18 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
